modules.uncrustify package¶

Submodules¶

modules.uncrustify.RunPreprocessor module¶

class modules.uncrustify.RunPreprocessor.CodeBeautify[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is to apply a preprocessing in the source code of the analyzed program, i.e., beautifier the code to define a set of code styles, such as: one command per line, and the block delimiters ({).

runBeatifyTool(pathJavaProgram, _pathfiletosave, _mode)[source]¶

Execute the shell command to perform the preprocessing with uncrustify.

Parameters:
  • pathJavaProgram (str) – path of the java file
  • _pathfiletosave (str) – path to save the output of the preprocessing code
  • _mode (bool) – True to save the preprocessing output in a file or False to print the output in the screen.
setConfigFile(filePath)[source]¶

Define the file with option to perform the preprocessing by uncrustify tool.

Parameters:filePath (str) – the path of the config file
setOptions2Run(options)[source]¶

Set the option to uncrustify tool that performs the preprocessing. The default option is -q -l C.

Parameters:options (str) – the options to perform the preprocessing by uncrustify tool.
